description: This file contains functions related to a three-body physics simulation, including acceleration calculations using the RK4 integrator method, and scenario generation for initial states. It provides computational logic for physics simulation in a visualization context.

methods.name: computeAccelerations(bodies, G = 1, softening = 0.0)
methods.description: Calculates the acceleration on each body due to gravitational forces from other bodies, with optional softening to prevent singularities.

methods.name: rk4Step(state, dt, G = 1, softening = 0.0, damping = 0.0)
methods.description: Performs a single Runge-Kutta 4th order integration step to update the state of the bodies over a time interval.

methods.name: createDefaultScenario()
methods.description: Generates an initial set of bodies with predefined positions and velocities for a stable three-body simulation scenario.

ctags.name: rk4Step
ctags.pattern: /^export function rk4Step(state, dt, G = 1, softening = 0.0, damping = 0.0) {$/

ctags.name: vAdd
ctags.pattern: /^const vAdd = (a, b) => ({ x: a.x + b.x, y: a.y + b.y });$/

ctags.name: vMul
ctags.pattern: /^const vMul = (a, s) => ({ x: a.x * s, y: a.y * s });$/

ctags.name: vSub
ctags.pattern: /^const vSub = (a, b) => ({ x: a.x - b.x, y: a.y - b.y });$/
